channel.title: Programmers and client editors reply!
channel.description: hi i was wandering if there is a more realistic "alternate" runscape client, moparscape's attacks are pathetic and the npc do not talk at all, and is there a posibility i can play moparscape with other players?? plz reply!! ty

item.title: Programmers and client editors reply!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

  1. All moparscape questions be asked at www.moparisthebest.com/smf
  2. Yes, you can play MoparScape with other players. To find out how, go to www.moparisthebest.com/smf
  3. P Servers are shite, and will never be properly like the real RuneScape.

Read full topic
